_header: Bring us in no brown bread for that is made of bran
_description: Bring us in good ale! — long lines in couplets, and refrain ‘And bryng vs in good ale’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Bryng vs in no browne bred fore þat is mad of braneNore bryng
                    vs in no whyt bred fore þer in is no game…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Nor bryng vs in no dokes flesch for þei slober in þe
                    merBut bryng vs in good ale
